018package org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.spi;

020import static java.nio.file.Files.createDirectories;
021import static java.nio.file.Files.createFile;
022import static java.nio.file.Files.exists;
023import static java.nio.file.Files.isDirectory;
024import static java.nio.file.Files.isRegularFile;
025import static java.util.Arrays.sort;
026import static java.util.Collections.addAll;
027import static java.util.Collections.unmodifiableSet;
028import static java.util.Locale.ROOT;
029import static org.apiguardian.api.API.Status.STABLE;
030import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Application.MSG_InvalidFile;
031import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Application.MSG_InvalidFolder;
032import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.COLUMN_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA_PRIMARY_KEY;
033import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Configuration.TABLE_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA;
034import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.assessDiastolicPressure;
035import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.assessSystolicPressure;
036import static org.tquadrat.bloodpressure.Diagnosis.combineDiagnosis;
037import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.nonNull;
038import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNonNullArgument;
039import static org.tquadrat.foundation.lang.Objects.requireNotEmptyArgument;
040import static org.tquadrat.foundation.util.StringUtils.format;

043import java.io.IOException;

071/**
072 *  The abstract base class for all reports.
073 *
074 *  @version $Id: ReportBase.java 126 2022-02-19 21:13:35Z tquadrat $
075 *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
076 *  @UMLGraph.link
077 *  @since 0.0.1
078 */
079@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ReportBase.java 126 2022-02-19 21:13:35Z tquadrat $" )
080@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
081public non-sealed abstract class ReportBase implements Report
082{
083        /*---------------*\
084    ====** Inner Classes **====================================================
085        \*---------------*/
086    /**
087     *  The type of the destination for the report.
088     *
089     *  @version $Id: ReportBase.java 126 2022-02-19 21:13:35Z tquadrat $
090     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
091     *  @UMLGraph.link
092     *  @since 0.0.1
093     */
094    @SuppressWarnings( "SpellCheckingInspection" )
095    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ReportBase.java 126 2022-02-19 21:13:35Z tquadrat $" )
096    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
097    public static enum DestinationType
098    {
099            /*------------------*\
100        ====** Enum Declaration **=================================================
101            \*------------------*/
102        /**
103         *  The destination is a file.
104         */
105        DEST_FILE,
106
107        /**
108         *  The destination is a folder.
109         */
110        DEST_FOLDER
111    }
112    //  enum DestinationType
113
114    /**
115     *  The record for the distribution data.
116     *
117     *  @version $Id: ReportBase.java 126 2022-02-19 21:13:35Z tquadrat $
118     *  @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
119     *  @UMLGraph.link
120     *  @since 0.0.1
121     */
122    @ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: ReportBase.java 126 2022-02-19 21:13:35Z tquadrat $" )
123    @API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
124    public static final class DistributionNode
125    {
126            /*------------*\
127        ====** Attributes **===================================================
128            \*------------*/
129        /**
130         *  The diagnosis for this node.
131         */
132        private final Diagnosis m_Diagnosis;
133
134        /**
135         *  The count for the diastolic values for this diagnosis.
136         */
137        private int m_DiastolicCount;
138
139        /**
140         *  The percentage of diastolic values for this diagnosis.
141         */
142        private double m_DiastolicPercent;
143
144        /**
145         *  The count for the systolic values for this diagnosis.
146         */
147        private int m_SystolicCount;
148
149        /**
150         *  The percentage of systolic values for this diagnosis.
151         */
152        private double m_SystolicPercent;
153
154            /*--------------*\
155        ====** Constructors **=================================================
156            \*--------------*/
157        /**
158         *  Creates a new instance of {@code DistributionName}.
159         *
160         *  @param  diagnosis   The diagnosis for this node.
161         */
162        public DistributionNode( final Diagnosis diagnosis )
163        {
164            m_Diagnosis = requireNonNullArgument( diagnosis, "diagnosis" );
165            m_SystolicCount = 0;
166            m_DiastolicCount = 0;
167            m_SystolicPercent = 0.0;
168            m_DiastolicPercent = 0.0;
169        }   //  DistributionNode()
170
171            /*---------*\
172        ====** Methods **======================================================
173            \*---------*/
174        /**
175         *  Calculates the diastolic percentage.
176         *
177         *  @param  totalCount  The total amount of values.
178         *  @return The percentage.
179         */
180        @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
181        public final double calcDiastolicPercentage( final int totalCount )
182        {
183            m_DiastolicPercent = (double) m_DiastolicCount * 100.0 / (double) totalCount;
184
185            //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
186            return m_DiastolicPercent;
187        }   //  calcDiastolicPercentage()
188
189        /**
190         *  Calculates the systolic percentage.
191         *
192         *  @param  totalCount  The total amount of values.
193         *  @return The percentage.
194         */
195        @SuppressWarnings( "UnusedReturnValue" )
196        public final double calcSystolicPercentage( final int totalCount )
197        {
198            m_SystolicPercent = (double) m_SystolicCount * 100.0 / (double) totalCount;
199
200            //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
201            return m_SystolicPercent;
202        }   //  calcSystolicPercentage()
203
204        /**
205         *  Returns the diagnosis.
206         *
207         *  @return The diagnosis.
208         */
209        @SuppressWarnings( "unused" )
210        public final Diagnosis getDiagnosis() { return m_Diagnosis; }
211
212        /**
213         *  Returns the amount of diastolic values for this diagnosis.
214         *
215         *  @return The value count.
216         */
217        public final int getDiastolicCount() { return m_DiastolicCount; }
218
219        /**
220         *  Returns the percentage of diastolic values for this diagnosis.
221         *
222         *  @return The value percentage.
223         */
224        public final double getDiastolicPercentage() { return m_DiastolicPercent; }
225
226        /**
227         *  Returns the amount of systolic values for this diagnosis.
228         *
229         *  @return The value count.
230         */
231        public final int getSystolicCount() { return m_SystolicCount; }
232
233        /**
234         *  Returns the percentage of systolic values for this diagnosis.
235         *
236         *  @return The value percentage.
237         */
238        public final double getSystolicPercentage() { return m_SystolicPercent; }
239
240        /**
241         *  Increments the counter for the diastolic values.
242         */
243        public final void incrementDiastolic() { ++m_DiastolicCount; }
244
245        /**
246         *  Increments the counter for the systolic values.
247         */
248        public final void incrementSystolic() { ++m_SystolicCount; }
249    }   //  class DistributionNode
250
251        /*-----------*\
252    ====** Constants **========================================================
253        \*-----------*/
254
255        /*------------*\
256    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
257        \*------------*/
258    /**
259     *  The reference to the configuration for this application.
260     */
261    private final Configuration m_Configuration;
262
263    /**
264     *  The registry for the report generators.
265     */
266    private static final Map<String,Report> m_Registry = new HashMap<>();
267
268    /**
269     *  <p>{@summary The report style.} Basically, this is the name of the
270     *  report generator.
271     */
272    private final String m_Style;
273
274    /**
275     *  The output formats that are supported by this report generator.
276     */
277    private final Set<ReportFormat> m_SupportedFormats = EnumSet.noneOf( ReportFormat.class );
278
279        /*------------------------*\
280    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
281        \*------------------------*/
282
283        /*--------------*\
284    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
285        \*--------------*/
286    /**
287     *  Creates a new instance of {@code ReportBase}.
288     *
289     *  @param  style   The report style.
290     *  @param  supportedFormats    The supported report output formats.
291     */
292    protected ReportBase( final String style, final ReportFormat... supportedFormats )
293    {
294        m_Configuration = Configuration.getInstance();
295        m_Style = requireNotEmptyArgument( style, "style" );
296        addAll( m_SupportedFormats, requireNotEmptyArgument( supportedFormats, "supportedFormats" ) );
297    }   //  ReportBase()
298
299        /*---------*\
300    ====** Methods **==========================================================
301        \*---------*/
302    /**
303     *  Makes an assessment of the given
304     *  {@link DataNode}.
305     *
306     *  @param  data    The data to assess.
307     *  @return The assessment.
308     */
309    protected Diagnosis assessData( final DataNode data )
310    {
311        final var systolicDiagnosis = assessSystolicPressure( data.systolic() );
312        final var diastolicDiagnosis = assessDiastolicPressure( data.diastolic() );
313        final var retValue = combineDiagnosis( systolicDiagnosis, diastolicDiagnosis );
314
315        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
316        return retValue;
317    }   //  assessData()
318
319    /**
320     *  Calculates the plain average for the given values.
321     *
322     *  @param  data    The input data.
323     *  @return The average.
324     */
325    protected final DataNode calculateAverage( final Map<? extends TemporalAccessor,DataNode> data )
326    {
327        final var retValue = calculateAverage( requireNonNullArgument( data, "data" ).values().toArray( DataNode []::new ) );
328
329        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
330        return retValue;
331    }   //  calculateAverage()
332
333    /**
334     *  Calculates the plain average for the given values.
335     *
336     *  @param  data    The input data.
337     *  @return The average.
338     */
339    protected final DataNode calculateAverage( final DataNode [] data )
340    {
341        final var size = requireNonNullArgument( data, "data" ).length;
342        var systolicSum = 0L;
343        var diastolicSum = 0L;
344        var pulsePressureSum = 0L;
345
346        for( var i = 0; i < size; ++i )
347        {
348            systolicSum += data [i].systolic();
349            diastolicSum += data [i].diastolic();
350            pulsePressureSum += data [i].pulsePressure();
351        }
352
353        final var retValue = new DataNode( (int) (systolicSum / size), (int) (diastolicSum / size), (int) (pulsePressureSum / size) );
354
355        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
356        return retValue;
357    }   //  calculateAverage()
358
359    /**
360     *  Calculates an average for the given values that is weighted to the end
361     *  of the list.
362     *
363     *  @param  data    The input data.
364     *  @return The average.
365     */
366    protected final DataNode calculateEndWeightedAverage( final SortedMap<? extends TemporalAccessor,DataNode> data )
367    {
368        final var retValue = calculateEndWeightedAverage( data.values().toArray( DataNode []::new ) );
369
370        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
371        return retValue;
372    }   //  calculateEndWeightedAverage()
373
374    /**
375     *  Calculates an average for the given values that is weighted to the end
376     *  of the list.
377     *
378     *  @param  data    The input data.
379     *  @return The average.
380     */
381    protected final DataNode calculateEndWeightedAverage( final DataNode[] data )
382    {
383        final var size = requireNonNullArgument( data, "data" ).length;
384        var systolicSum = 0L;
385        var diastolicSum = 0L;
386        var pulsePressureSum = 0L;
387
388        for( var i = 0; i < size; ++i )
389        {
390            systolicSum += (long) data [i].systolic() * (i + 1);
391            diastolicSum += (long) data [i].diastolic() * (i + 1);
392            pulsePressureSum += (long) data [i].pulsePressure() * (i + 1);
393        }
394
395        final var divisor = (size + 1) * (size / 2);
396
397        final var retValue = new DataNode( (int) (systolicSum / divisor), (int) (diastolicSum / divisor), (int) (pulsePressureSum / divisor) );
398
399        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
400        return retValue;
401    }   //  calculateEndWeightedAverage()
402
403    /**
404     *  Calculates a median for the given values.
405     *
406     *  @param  data    The input data.
407     *  @return The median.
408     */
409    protected final int calculateMedian( final int[] data )
410    {
411        final var copy = requireNonNullArgument( data, "data" ).clone();
412        sort( copy );
413        final var size = copy.length;
414        final var index = size / 2;
415
416        final var retValue = switch( size % 2 )
417            {
418                case 0 -> copy [index];
419                case 1 -> (copy [index] + copy [index + 1]) / 2;
420                default -> throw new ImpossibleExceptionError( new Exception( "Impossible value" ) );
421            };
422
423        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
424        return retValue;
425    }   //  calculateMedian()
426
427    /**
428     *  Calculates a median for the given values.
429     *
430     *  @param  data    The input data.
431     *  @return The median.
432     */
433    protected final DataNode calculateMedian( final Map<? extends TemporalAccessor,DataNode> data )
434    {
435        final var size = requireNonNullArgument( data, "data" ).size();
436        final var systolicArray = new int [size];
437        final var diastolicArray = new int [size];
438        final var pulsePressureArray = new int [size];
439
440        var index = 0;
441        for( final var node : data.values() )
442        {
443            systolicArray [index] = node.systolic();
444            diastolicArray [index] = node.diastolic();
445            pulsePressureArray [index] = node.pulsePressure();
446            ++index;
447        }
448
449        final var systolic = calculateMedian( systolicArray );
450        final var diastolic = calculateMedian(diastolicArray );
451        final var pulsePressure = calculateMedian( pulsePressureArray );
452
453        final var retValue =  new DataNode( systolic, diastolic, pulsePressure );
454
455        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
456        return retValue;
457    }   //  calculateMedian()
458
459    /**
460     *  Checks whether the given destination is valid according to the given
461     *      type and returns the path for an existing file or folder.
462     *
463     * @param   destination The destination.
464     * @param   type    The type of the destination.
465     * @return  The path for the destination.
466     * @throws IOException  The destination is invalid.
467     */
468    @SuppressWarnings( "SameParameterValue" )
469    protected final Path checkDestination( final File destination, final DestinationType type ) throws IOException
470    {
471        Path retValue = requireNonNullArgument( destination, "destination" ).toPath();
472        switch( requireNonNullArgument( type, "type" ) )
473        {
474            case DEST_FILE ->
475            {
476                if( exists( retValue) )
477                {
478                    if( !isRegularFile( retValue ) ) throw new IOException( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_InvalidFile, destination.getAbsolutePath() ) );
479                }
480                else
481                {
482                    final var parent = retValue.getParent();
483                    if( !exists( parent ) ) createDirectories( parent );
484                    createFile( retValue );
485                }
486            }
487            case DEST_FOLDER ->
488            {
489                if( exists( retValue ) )
490                {
491                    if( !isDirectory( retValue ) ) throw new IOException( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_InvalidFolder, destination.getAbsolutePath() ) );
492                }
493                else
494                {
495                    createDirectories( retValue );
496                }
497            }
498        }
499
500        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
501        return retValue;
502    }   //  checkDestination()
503
504    /**
505     *  Distributes the data based on the diagnosis.
506     *
507     *  @param  data    The input data.
508     *  @return The distribution.
509     */
510    protected final Map<Diagnosis,DistributionNode> distributeData( final Map<LocalDateTime,DataNode> data )
511    {
512        final Map<Diagnosis,DistributionNode> retValue = new EnumMap<>( Diagnosis.class );
513        for( final var node : data.values() )
514        {
515            var diagnosis = assessSystolicPressure( node.systolic() );
516            retValue.computeIfAbsent( diagnosis, DistributionNode::new ).incrementSystolic();
517            diagnosis = assessDiastolicPressure( node.diastolic() );
518            retValue.computeIfAbsent( diagnosis, DistributionNode::new ).incrementDiastolic();
519        }
520
521        final var totalCount = data.size();
522        for( final var node : retValue.values() )
523        {
524            node.calcSystolicPercentage( totalCount );
525            node.calcDiastolicPercentage( totalCount );
526        }
527
528        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
529        return retValue;
530    }   //  distributeData()
531
532    /**
533     *  Compresses the values so that there is only one entry per day.
534     *
535     *  @param  data    The input data.
536     *  @return The compressed data.
537     */
538    protected final SortedMap<LocalDate,DataNode> compressToDay( final SortedMap<LocalDateTime,DataNode> data )
539    {
540        final var retValue = new TreeMap<LocalDate,DataNode>();
541
542        LocalDate currentDay = null;
543        final var currentDayData = new ArrayList<DataNode>();
544
545        for( final var entry : requireNonNullArgument( data, "data" ).entrySet() )
546        {
547            final var day = entry.getKey().toLocalDate();
548            if( !day.equals( currentDay ) && !currentDayData.isEmpty() )
549            {
550                retValue.put( currentDay, calculateAverage( currentDayData.toArray( DataNode []::new ) ) );
551                currentDayData.clear();
552            }
553            currentDay = day;
554            currentDayData.add( entry.getValue() );
555        }
556        if( nonNull( currentDay ) )
557        {
558            retValue.put( currentDay, calculateAverage( currentDayData.toArray( DataNode []::new ) ) );
559        }
560
561        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
562        return retValue;
563    }   //  compressToDay()
564
565    /**
566     *  {@inheritDoc}
567     */
568    @Override
569    public abstract void generateReport( final File destination, final ReportFormat format ) throws IOException, SQLException;
570
571    /**
572     *  Returns a reference to the configuration for this application run.
573     *
574     *  @return The configuration.
575     */
576    protected final Configuration getConfiguration() { return m_Configuration; }
577
578    /**
579     *  {@inheritDoc}
580     */
581    @Override
582    public String getStyle() { return m_Style; }
583
584    /**
585     *  Loads the data from the database.
586     *
587     *  @param  connection  The database connection.
588     *  @param  timezone    The time zone for the report.
589     *  @param  start   The start date.
590     *  @param  end The end date.
591     *  @return The data.
592     *  @throws SQLException    Problems when accessing the database.
593     */
594    protected final SortedMap<LocalDateTime,DataNode> loadData( final Connection connection, final ZoneId timezone, final LocalDate start, final LocalDate end ) throws SQLException
595    {
596        final var startTime = requireNonNullArgument( start, "start" )
597            .atTime( 0, 0 )
598            .atZone( timezone );
599        final var endTime = (requireNonNullArgument( end, "end" ).equals( LocalDate.MAX ) ? end : end.plusDays( 1 ))
600            .atTime( 0,0 )
601            .atZone( timezone );
602
603        final var sql = format(
604            """
605            SELECT * FROM  %1$s
606              WHERE %2$s > ?
607                AND %2$s < ?\
608            """, TABLE_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA, COLUMN_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA_PRIMARY_KEY );
609        final SortedMap<LocalDateTime,DataNode> retValue = new TreeMap<>();
610        try( final var statement = requireNonNullArgument( connection, "connection" ).prepareStatement( sql ) )
611        {
612            statement.setObject( 1, startTime );
613            statement.setObject( 2, endTime );
614            try( final var resultSet = statement.executeQuery() )
615            {
616                while( resultSet.next() )
617                {
618                    final var isIgnored = resultSet.getBoolean( 4 );
619                    if( !isIgnored )
620                    {
621                        final var timestamp = resultSet.getObject( 1, LocalDateTime.class );
622                        final var systolic = resultSet.getInt( 2 );
623                        final var diastolic = resultSet.getInt( 3 );
624                        final var dataNode = new DataNode( systolic, diastolic );
625                        retValue.put( timestamp, dataNode );
626                    }
627                }
628            }
629        }
630
631        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
632        return retValue;
633    }   //  loadData()
634
635    /**
636     *  Registers a report generator.
637     *
638     *  @param  report  The report generator to register.
639     */
640    public static final void registerReport( final Report report )
641    {
642        final var style = requireNonNullArgument( report, "report" ).getStyle().toUpperCase( ROOT );
643        m_Registry.put( style, report );
644    }   //  registerReport()
645
646    /**
647     *  Retrieves the report generator for the given style and format.
648     *
649     *  @param  style   The report style.
650     *  @param  format  The output format for the report.
651     *  @return An instance of
652     *      {@link Optional}
653     *      that holds the report generator. It will be
654     *      {@linkplain Optional#empty()}
655     *      if there is no registered report for the given style, or when the
656     *      style does not support the requested format.
657     */
658    public static final Optional<Report> retrieveReport( final String style, final ReportFormat format )
659    {
660        Optional<Report> retValue = Optional.empty();
661        final var report = m_Registry.get( requireNotEmptyArgument( style, "style" ).toUpperCase( ROOT ) );
662        if( nonNull( report ) && report.supportedOutputFormats().contains( requireNonNullArgument( format, "format" ) ) )
663        {
664            retValue = Optional.of( report );
665        }
666
667        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
668        return retValue;
669    }   //  retrieveReport()
670
671    /**
672     *  Retrieves the text identified by the given usage and id.
673     *
674     *  @param  usage   The text usage.
675     *  @param  id  The id for the text.
676     *  @param  args    The optional components for the text.
677     *  @return The requested text.
678     */
679    protected final String retrieveText( final TextUse usage, final String id, final Object... args )
680    {
681        final var retValue = m_Configuration.getText( getClass(), usage, id, args );
682
683        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
684        return retValue;
685    }   //  retrieveText()
686
687    /**
688     *  {@inheritDoc}
689     */
690    @Override
691    public final Set<ReportFormat> supportedOutputFormats()
692    {
693        return unmodifiableSet( m_SupportedFormats );
694    }   //  supportedOutputFormats()
695}
696//  class ReportBase
697
698/*
699 *  End of File
700 */
